content: Economics is the social science that studies the production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services, with the goal of understanding how individuals, businesses, governments, and societies make decisions about how to allocate limited resources to meet their unlimited wants and needs.
Economics is the study of how people, businesses, and societies make decisions about how to use limited resources to meet their needs and wants.
